options.name: Investigative Research
options.description: At the end of a Full Rest, you choose one Knowledge Skill. Until the end of your next Full Rest, you become Good at that Skill.

options.name: Quick Evaluations
options.description: Whenever an Initiative Check or Modifier is used, you can use your Insight Skill instead

options.name: Specialist
options.description: You choose a Creature Type besides a Beast or Construct. When you are on the receiving end of a True Hit from a Creature of this Type, it is downgraded 1 Tier. Additionally you gain a +2 Bonus when making Search and Insight Checks against this Creature Type. You can change this Creature Type when you Level or spend at least 1 Week of down time in a Settlement.

options.name: Bad Cop
options.description: When you have dealt Damage to a Creature within the last minute, you gain a 1d4 Bonus to Insight and Persuasion Checks against them.

options.name: Free Action : Deduction
options.description: You attempt to read a Creatures body language and predict their most likely move by rolling a Contested Insight Check against their Performance. On a success, you gain a 1d4 Bonus to any Defensive Check you make against that Creature until the start of your next turn. This ability does not work on Beasts or Constructs.
